title: SkillSetOfferPayload (SSO_Payload)
description: Schema for the payload of a Skill Set Offer (SSO) message in ACNBP. Sent by a_prov_candidate to a_req. This payload is digitally signed.

messageId.description: Unique identifier for this SSO message.

inReplyToMessageId.description: The ID of the SSR message this offer is responding to.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the SSO was created.

providerAgentId.description: The ANS name or unique ID of the Provider Agent (a_prov_candidate).

offerStatus.description: Status of the offer: 'success' if meets request, 'failure' if cannot meet, 'partial_match' if some discrepancies, 'clarification_needed' if more info required from requester.

statusMessage.description: Optional human-readable message related to the offerStatus, especially for failure or partial_match.

offeredCapabilityId.description: The capability being offered, should match targetCapabilityId from SSR.

offeredSkillSet.description: The specific skill set the provider can offer for the capability. May be empty if offerStatus is 'failure'.

offeredCosts.description: The detailed cost structure for the offered skill set. May be absent if offerStatus is 'failure'.

offeredQoS.description: The achievable Quality of Service for the offered skill set. May be absent if offerStatus is 'failure'.

validUntil.description: Optional: Timestamp indicating how long this offer is valid.
